story: Ahmed Saleh shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Web.ts by medozs
caption: medozs.github.io
description: web.ts is designed to make web design better using Object Oriented programing and MVC architecture where is there separation between Views(HTML/CSS) and Controller(.ts classes) in Typescript to create native OO and asynchronous(AJAX) apps. Due to the separation, views can be easily designed using Inâ€¦

data.message: Can you please provide description for the links you are sharing? I mean, did you like the library for any specific reason? Are you trying to point to something?
I am the founder. What do you think about it guys?

I was eager to ask if you created that. That's awesome ... Can you quickly explain what you are trying to do/achieve and who would benefit from using your library? I mean what are the problems you are trying to solve ... what's your edge compared to other MVC JavaScript frameworks ... that kind of questions :) What is the feedback you're looking for ... etc :)

I am influenced by android development in developing this framework. Converting HTML/CSS and Javascript into components  (controller ts class [extending WebList or WebDocument or implement WebView]  and HTML/CSS views). Also, you don't need to learn anything new unlike other frameworks. you just have the file, change it and it works.
